rukus.text: kul ya eyyuhe-nnasu in kuntum fi sekkim min dini fela a`budu-llezine ta`budune min duni-llahi velakin a`budu-llahe-llezi yeteveffakum. veumirtu en ekune mine-lmu'minin
veen ekim vecheke lildini hanifa. vela tekunenne mine-lmusrikin
vela ted`u min duni-llahi ma la yenfe`uke vela yedurruk. fein fe`alte feinneke izem mine-zzalimin
veiy yemseske-llahu bidurrin fela kasife lehu illa hu. veiy yuridke bihayrin fela radde lifadlih. yusibu bihi mey yesau min `ibadih. vehuve-lgafuru-rrahim
kul ya eyyuhe-nnasu kad caekumu-lhakku mir rabbikum. femeni-hteda feinnema yehtedi linefsih. vemen dalle feinnema yedillu `aleyha. vema ene `aleykum bivekil
vettebi` ma yuha ileyke vasbir hatta yahkume-llah. vehuve hayru-lhakimin
